teamMembers.name: Dr. Evelyn Reed
teamMembers.description: Dr. Reed is a compassionate clinical psychologist with over 15 years of experience in mental health care. She founded Luminara to create a safe, accessible space for individuals to find support and healing.

teamMembers.name: Marcus Thorne
teamMembers.description: Marcus is dedicated to building strong community partnerships and ensuring our services reach those who need them most. He has a background in social work and community development.

teamMembers.name: Dr. Kenji Tanaka
teamMembers.description: Dr. Tanaka specializes in mood disorders and works closely with our therapy team to provide comprehensive, integrated care for our clients.

teamMembers.name: Chloe Addison
teamMembers.description: Chloe brings empathy and a calm presence to our crisis helpline. She is a certified crisis counselor with a passion for helping people in their most difficult moments.

teamMembers.name: Ben Carter
teamMembers.description: Having navigated his own mental health journey, Ben is a passionate advocate for peer support. He facilitates several of our weekly support groups with warmth and understanding.

teamMembers.name: Sofia Garcia
teamMembers.description: Sofia uses her organizational skills to plan and execute our community workshops and fundraising events. She believes in the power of education to destigmatize mental health.

teamMembers.name: Liam O'Connell
teamMembers.description: Liam is a patient and attentive listener on our support helpline. He is currently a psychology student dedicated to learning and contributing to the mental health field.
